nodes.text: "Deadeye" Grath was a Human female criminal who was imprisoned by the Galactic Republic in Belsavis prison, a prison facility on the planet Belsavis. During the invasion of Belsavis in the Galactic War, Grath was freed from imprisonment, and started selling weapon and gear modifications to the forces of the Sith Empire in the Imperial Lodgement in the Minimum Security Section.
"Deadeye" Grath appears as a Modification Commendations Vendor for Imperial players on Belsavis in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
